summary: This document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services, authorizing the removal of Power of Attorney and all authorities related to her specified accounts. It indicates a financial decision regarding her accounts.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the sender of the letter, authorizing the removal of Power of Attorney on her accounts.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is the recipient of the letter from Ghislaine Maxwell regarding her financial accounts.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is a client of Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is authorizing the removal of Power of Attorney on her financial accounts.
The letter is addressed to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services.
